title: 04/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses quarterback prospect Zach Wilson and why creating your own chaos is detrimental to success in the NFL, not a strength. He thinks the media is falling for the same mistake by choosing a finesse offense over a tough defense when analyzing the NBA championship contenders. Colin explains why he was right about LeBron James and the Lakers and why he was wrong about QB Teddy Bridgewater. Plus, Albert Breer joins the show to Colin what’s going on between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers front office this offseason.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
